title_search.info: Please enter the title or ISBN of your book.
title_search.title: Title search

anonymous_sign_in.description:
Your data will be stored as long as you stay signed in. When you sign out, your data will be erased.

You can always upgrade to a regular account later on.
anonymous_sign_in.title: Anonymous Login

anonymous_sign_out.description:
You are going to delete all your data right now. Proceeding now will permanently remove all your books.

 Do you want to proceed?
anonymous_sign_out.title: Anonymous Logout

delete_account.description:
You are going to delete your account and all your data right now. Proceeding now will permanently remove all your books.

 Do you want to proceed?
delete_account.title: Delete Account

delete_mail_account.description:
You are going to delete your account and all your data right now. Proceeding now will permanently remove all your books.

 Enter your password to proceed.

authentication.forgot_password_info: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
authentication.forgot_password_sent_info: Check your email and open the link we sent to continue.

link_account.provider_already_linked: This provider is already linked to another account

authentication.login_with_account: Sign in with your account to synchronize your books with other devices.
authentication.password_rules: Passwords must be 10 characters in length and have at least one uppercase character, one lowercase character, one number, and one special character.
authentication.sign_up_rules: Create an account using your email address and a password. Passwords must be 10 characters in length and have at least one uppercase character, one lowercase character, one number, and one special character.
authentication.unlink_email_description: Click the Unlink button below to unlink your Email account from this Dante account.
authentication.unlink_google_description: Click the Unlink button below to unlink your Google account from this Dante account.

book_action.share_message: Hey, I'm currently reading {} and it's awesome! Check it out: {}

empty_states.read: There are no finished books. Why not finish one?
empty_states.read_later: You currently have no books that you have saved for later. Go add some.
empty_states.reading: Why are you not reading a book now?
empty_states.search: No books found, check one of the other tabs or try searching online.
empty_states.wishlist: You have not added a book to your wishlist yet.

book_list.pick_random_book_description: Can't decide which book to read next? We've got you covered. Just tap the button below to pick a random book for your next read.

book_management.backup_info: Dante automatically backs up your data as you go. If you wish to manually backup your data, you can do so here.
book_management.google_drive_backup_info: Backup your data on Google Drive. This requires you to be logged in with your Google Account. Backups can be restored on other devices when logged in with the same account.
book_management.restore_detail: Choose merge if you want to preserve the books on your device and complement the collection with the missing books in the backup. Or chose overwrite to completely delete all the books on your device and replace them with the books in the backup file.
book_management.title: Book management

edit_book.discard_changes_description: Are you sure you want to discard the changes you made to this book?

recommendations.not_found: No recommendations found, try pulling to refresh!
recommendations.title: Recommendations

search.no_results: Looks like we couldn't find any books matching your search. Try again with a different search term.

books.random_book_selection_description: Show the interaction allowing you to pick a random book from your read later list
books.show_book_summary_description: Show a summary of the book in the details screen
books.title: Books

contribute.feedback_description: Help us improve the app by providing feedback or reporting bugs.
contribute.title: Contribute

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.tracking_description: Help improve the app by sending anonymous usage data to our servers.

timeline.empty: You haven't finished any books yet for us to show you a timeline. Get reading and come back!

sort_by.description: The timeline shows you exactly when you read each and every book in your library. You can chose how it should be sorted.
sort_by.title: Sort by

timeline.title: My Timeline
